text: 9.23 Lom 8.28-30, Epe 1.3-12, Kol 1.27 Pen ne binɨb kɨli kɨles tɨmel yad ak mɨlek tep awl yɨbɨl yad ak abe nɨgtep gɨlaŋ agɨl gos nɨgup. Binɨb kɨlop mapen nɨgup okok, kɨli sɨge cheg tep tek mɨdebal ak, kɨles ne mɨlek tep ne anɨb ak kɨlop monmon ñub. Pen binɨb anɨb okok, God bɨlel kɨlop gek, kɨli kɨles ne mɨlek tep ne ak dɨnɨg mɨdebal.
